text.div:
ResidualTumourStatus

Lists the options for residual tumour status

  • Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.hl7.org.au/fhir/rcpa/CodeSystem/residual-tumour-status

name: ResidualTumourStatus
description: Lists the options for residual tumour status
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International         Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by         agreement    between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this         agreement

contains.display: R0: Complete resection, margins histologically negative, no residual tumour left after resection (primary tumour, regional nodes)
R1: Incomplete resection, margins histologically involved, microscopic tumour remains after resection of gross disease (primary tumour, regional nodes)
R2: Incomplete resection, margins macroscopically involved or gross disease remains after subtotal resection (eg primary tumour, regional nodes, or liver metastasis).
